output: Gradio is a Python package that allows you to quickly create customizable, interactive UI components for your machine learning models or data processing pipelines. It provides a simple way to create a web-based user interface for your Python code without requiring any HTML, CSS, or JavaScript knowledge. With Gradio, you can create interfaces for inputting data, running prediction models, and displaying results. It supports a variety of input and output types, including images, audio, text, files, and more. Gradio is easy to install with pip and has a user-friendly API, making it a popular package for quickly deploying machine learning models as web-based applications.
